title: FoTA Meeting and Sale 11 March in Atlanta
content:
The [Atlanta Friends of the Alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234535/http:/www.friendsofthealphabet.org/) in Atlanta GA [USA] is a guild for calligraphers, lettering and book artists, as well as type designers and typographers (but with more of a focus on traditional calligraphy.)   
   
This coming Tuesday is FoTA's annual [White Elephant and Calligraphy Supply Sale.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234535/http:/www.friendsofthealphabet.org/callig_sale.html) It is also FoTA's first meeting in our new meeting space at Atlanta First United Methodist Church in the middle of downtown Atlanta. There's even free parking under constant surveillance. [Directions can be found here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019234535/http:/www.friendsofthealphabet.org/afumc_directions.html). Come one, come all. There will also be a second sale on the following Saturday (see site.)
author: johnbutler
